bullets.text: Prolonged U.S. shutdown persists; Trump resists compromise, raising risks of economic drag, delayed data, and funding disruptions.
Venezuela launches sweeping military exercises amid intensifying U.S. pressure, heightening regional tensions and potential spillovers to oil markets and sanctions risk.
Israeli forces fire on vehicle allegedly crossing Gaza cease-fire line, underscoring fragile truce and persistent escalation risks.
Israel’s Haredi draft fight threatens coalition stability and war manpower planning, with major implications for defense policy and social cohesion.
Big banks post strong earnings but report rising bad loans, signaling credit deterioration that could tighten lending and pressure future profitability.
Zions Bank scandal alleging sweeping betrayal of trust spooks investors, spotlighting governance failures and operational risk in regional lenders.
Activist Starboard targets Keurig Dr Pepper ahead of JDE Peet’s deal, pushing value creation via portfolio moves and operational improvements.
Trading card boom lifts Target and Walmart pre-holidays, signaling resilient niche discretionary demand despite broader consumer caution.
WhatsApp bans general-purpose chatbots and blocks NSO Group, tightening platform governance with privacy, surveillance, and AI policy ramifications.
Wikipedia traffic declines blamed on AI search summaries and social video, highlighting distribution shifts and monetization challenges for knowledge platforms.
NOAA winter outlook projects regional temperature and precipitation anomalies, informing energy demand forecasts, agriculture planning, and supply chain risk management.
Metabolic surgery delivers superior long-term health outcomes versus GLP-1 drugs, suggesting cost-effectiveness advantages and potential shifts in obesity-treatment strategies.
Scientists decode noncoding DNA regulatory "grammar" influencing disease risk, enabling improved target discovery, diagnostics, and personalized medicine.
3D-printed metamaterials that block vibrations could protect infrastructure and advance precision manufacturing and aerospace.
